title: Climate Modelling 2: The atmosphere and the radiation, a combination that makes the magic happen

media:group.media:title: Climate Modelling 2: The atmosphere and the radiation, a combination that makes the magic happen
media:group.media:description: Discusses the vertical structure of the atmosphere (density/pressure, temperature) and the distribution of radiation from the Sun and the Earth, and a simplified explanation of how the two interact to keep the planet warm.
